question: Which among the following is an Indian Document / proposal ?
option1: International Convention for the Suppression of Terrorist Bombings
option2: Declaration on Measures to Eliminate International Terrorism.
explanation: Comprehensive Convention on International Terrorism or, the CCIT is an Indian document, which outlines the definition of terrorism and proposal of anti-terror law submitted to United Nations in the late 90s, which is under discussion for many years.In 2001, India in fact submitted its revised version and has been pitching for its implementation.
